reviews.review_msg: DO NOT take this professor. Her thoughts are all over the place, the instructions are clear but what she expects differently from the instructions. She gives F without any comment or any explanation. If you make a mistake and references she gives you and F and says "plagiarism"

I wish there were a rating of negative for Prof. Pacheco. Her assignment outlines are detailed but what she expects isnt on the outline. Her lectures are long (3hrs) and she is all over the place with her thoughts. She fails numerous students and others skim by which reflects her lack of teaching. Her class doesnt follow the class description.

Don't expect to understand any expectations in this class. Makes a big deal about submission deadlines that we have to follow, but does not make an effort to mark work in a timely manner. It is the end of term and after 2 assignment submissions, we have no feedback or grades. It is clear she places her classes at the bottom of her priorities.
